content.question: ​A regression is calculated on a data set of coordinate pairs <math alttext="open parentheses x comma y close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. The resulting regression model is <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals A plus B ln x"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>B</mi><mi>ln</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="A greater than 0"><semantics><mrow><mi>A</mi><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="B greater than 1"><semantics><mrow><mi>B</mi><mo>></mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. The same model can be expressed as <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals A plus C log subscript 5 x"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>5</mn></msub><mi>x</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. What is the value of <math alttext="C"><semantics><mi>C</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> in terms of <math alttext="B"><semantics><mi>B</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="fraction numerator B over denominator ln 5 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mi>B</mi><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

topic.text: 2.14: Logarithmic Function Context and Data Modeling

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
